long_description: Just the right size for holding workout clothes and running shoes, the 30-liter Columbia Lode Hauler Duffel makes it easy to grab your bag and head to the gym for an early-morning training session. Super-tough ballistic polyester fabric has been treated with Omni-Shield(R) advanced repellency to resist rain, stains and abrasion. 30-liter main compartment features 1 zippered organizer pocket. Techlite(R) padded shoulder straps increase carrying comfort; grab handles provide additional carry options. Multi-point lashdown system lets you easily strap it to your roof rack. Columbia 30-liter Lode Hauler duffel bag measures 19 x 12 x 9 in. Closeout.
short_description: Just the right size for holding workout clothes and running shoes, the 30-liter Columbia Lode Hauler Duffel makes it easy to grab your bag and head to the gym for an early-morning training session.
